title: STAT+: White House looks for more drug pricing deals to add to TrumpRx
description: The Trump administration wants more companies to offer prescription drugs at discounted cash prices on TrumpRx.
content: The Trump administration wants more companies to offer prescription drugs at discounted cash prices on TrumpRx.
